name: Jetski Joyride
description:
HOT BIKINI GIRL SAVES TUTLES BY PICKING UP TRASH ON A JETSKI

WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT?????!!?!?!?

oh but watch out for those seagulls, yeah? the little shits are aggressive this time of year...

(Created in 48 hours for the Playmakers Summertime Game Jam)

(WASD to move, SPACE to jump when touching a wave. Pick up trash, avoid everything else.)
